author: jstrachan
msg: Removed IDE file temporary file added to cvs by accident

author: jstrachan
msg: Added patches by James Elson to support <xtags:stylesheet> and <xtags:template> without requiring seperate JSP or Action objects. Also patched <xtags:style> so that implicit communication between <xtags:style> and <xtags:parse> is no longer enabled - communication must be explicit.

author: jstrachan
msg: Fixed mistake in addition logic - this patch was submitted by James Elson

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied patch supplied by James Elson that maintains context across <jsp:include> by always using the current page context ahead of the request context but always set both contexts so that the context is available to included pages

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched <replace> example to work with Tomcat 4.0
